Lems.description: Network descriptions in NeuroML 2. Describes _network_ elements containing _population_s

ComponentType.name: network
ComponentType.description: Network containing _population_s, _projection_s and lists of _explicitConnection_s (either directly between components of the populations or via synapses)

ComponentType.name: networkWithTemperature
ComponentType.description: Network containing _population_s, _projection_s and lists of _explicitConnection_s (either directly between components of the populations or via synapses), and an explicit temperature

ComponentType.name: basePopulation
ComponentType.description: A population of cells (anything which extends _baseCell_)

ComponentType.name: population
ComponentType.description: A population of components, with just one parameter for the _size

Parameter.name: size
Parameter.description: Number of instances of this Component to create when the population is instantiated

ComponentType.name: populationList
ComponentType.description: An explicit list of the cells in the population.

ComponentType.name: instance
ComponentType.description: Specifies a single instance of a component in a population (placed at _location_).

ComponentType.name: location
ComponentType.description: Specifies location of a single _instance_ of a component in a population

ComponentType.name: region
ComponentType.description: Initial attempt to specify 3D region for placing cells. Work in progress...

ComponentType.name: rectangularExtent
ComponentType.description: For defining a 3D rectangular box

ComponentType.name: projection
ComponentType.description: Projection from one population, _presynapticPopulation to another, _postsynapticPopulation, through _synapse. Contains lists of _connection_ or _connectionWD_ elements.

ComponentType.name: explicitConnection
ComponentType.description: Explicit event connection between components

ComponentType.name: connection
ComponentType.description: Event connection directly between named components, which gets processed via a new instance of a _synapse component which is created on the target component. Normally contained inside a _projection_ element.

ComponentType.name: synapticConnection
ComponentType.description: Explicit event connection between named components, which gets processed via a new instance of a _synapse component which is created on the target component

ComponentType.name: synapticConnectionWD
ComponentType.description: Explicit event connection between named components, which gets processed via a new instance of a _synapse component which is created on the target component, includes setting of _weight and _delay for the synaptic connection

ComponentType.name: connectionWD
ComponentType.description: Event connection between named components, which gets processed via a new instance of a synapse component which is created on the target component, includes setting of _weight and _delay for the synaptic connection

ComponentType.name: electricalConnection
ComponentType.description: To enable connections between populations through gap junctions.

ComponentType.name: electricalConnectionInstance
ComponentType.description: To enable connections between populations through gap junctions. Populations need to be of type _populationList_ and contain _instance_ and _location_ elements.

ComponentType.name: electricalConnectionInstanceW
ComponentType.description: To enable connections between populations through gap junctions. Populations need to be of type _populationList_ and contain _instance_ and _location_ elements. Includes setting of _weight for the connection

ComponentType.name: electricalProjection
ComponentType.description: A projection between _presynapticPopulation to another _postsynapticPopulation through gap junctions.

ComponentType.name: continuousConnection
ComponentType.description: An instance of a connection in a _continuousProjection_ between _presynapticPopulation to another _postsynapticPopulation through a _preComponent at the start and _postComponent at the end. Can be used for analog synapses.

ComponentType.name: continuousConnectionInstance
ComponentType.description: An instance of a connection in a _continuousProjection_ between _presynapticPopulation to another _postsynapticPopulation through a _preComponent at the start and _postComponent at the end. Populations need to be of type _populationList_ and contain _instance_ and _location_ elements. Can be used for analog synapses.

ComponentType.name: continuousConnectionInstanceW
ComponentType.description: An instance of a connection in a _continuousProjection_ between _presynapticPopulation to another _postsynapticPopulation through a _preComponent at the start and _postComponent at the end. Populations need to be of type _populationList_ and contain _instance_ and _location_ elements. Can be used for analog synapses. Includes setting of _weight for the connection

ComponentType.name: continuousProjection
ComponentType.description: A projection between _presynapticPopulation and _postsynapticPopulation through components _preComponent at the start and _postComponent at the end of a _continuousConnection_ or _continuousConnectionInstance_. Can be used for analog synapses.

ComponentType.name: explicitInput
ComponentType.description: An explicit input (anything which extends _basePointCurrent_) to a target cell in a population

ComponentType.name: inputList
ComponentType.description: An explicit list of inputs. Not yet stable...

ComponentType.name: input
ComponentType.description: Specifies input lists.

ComponentType.name: inputW
ComponentType.description: Specifies input lists. Can set _weight to scale individual inputs.
